title: How Papa Got His Groove Back
description: When Wilma's Aunt visits her, Wilma tries to set her up with Alonzo. Alonzo is very hesitant because he's still mourning his wife but decides to give it a try. But when her Aunt catches a glimpse of Maxey she makes a move on him which he tries to resist but she's just too strong for him.

title: Penal Envy
description: Wilma is asking for a case she can try. The guys promise her the next person who comes in with a case is hers. And the next guy who comes in, wants to sue a company that advertised it can make him more endowed but it didn't work.

title: No Sweat
description: When Wilma and Alonzo defend a man who's accused of robbery. They're hoping that by putting him on the stand proclaiming his innocence will get him off. But because the man sweats when he is nervous, they fear that it will be taken as a sign of guilt so they try to find a way to keep him dry.

title: One on One
description: One of the firm's old clients who likes playing basketball asks Maxey to play with him. Eventually the competition between them gets so heated that the man dies. Maxey thinks about quitting.

title: Too Hot Not to Cool Down
A Day in the Life II
When a Man Is a Woman
